name: Marital Status

values.definition: Person who is separated from spouse but not divorced
Person who is not married and has not been married
Person in common law marriage relationship
Person who is legally separated from spouse
Person living together with partner without formal marriage
Person with interlocutory decree (temporary legal status)
Person whose marriage has been legally annulled
Person with marital status not covered by other codes
Person in legally registered domestic partnership
Person who has never been married
Person whose marital status is unreported or undisclosed
Person whose marital status is unknown
Person whose spouse has died and who has not remarried

notes: User-defined table allows customization for jurisdictional and cultural variations
